column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " The bison are the original airbenders .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm just lucky no one 's hurt .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But I also realized that perhaps I was too harsh on you .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Does that mean I can get my airbender tattoos ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's hard for me to believe that my little girl is grown up enough to have her tattoos .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I guess everyone is growing up .
#Text=" Main Bumi Daw Ikki Jinora Kai Meelo Otaku Tenzin Yung Antagonists Bison rustlers says : " Minor Bolin Bum - Ju Korra Kya Mako Oogi Pema " Tenzin says : " Earth .
#Text=When I was a boy , my father , Avatar Aang , told me the story of how he and his friends heroically ended the Hundred Year War .

#Text=Avatar Aang and Fire Lord Zuko transformed the Fire Nation colonies into the United Republic of Nations , a society where benders and nonbenders from all over the world could live and thrive together in peace and harmony .
#Text=They named the capital of this great land , Republic City .
#Text=Avatar Aang accomplished many remarkable things in his life .
#Text=But sadly , his time in this world came to an end .
#Text=And like the cycle of the seasons , the cycle of the Avatar began anew .
